name: mingine-engine
description: A truly mini physics and game engine for the web

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist node_modules src/*/bin src/*/obj distbundle.js
scripts.build: dotnet fable src/Mingine.Engine -o dist && esbuild dist/JavaScript.js --outfile=distbundle.js --bundle --format=esm
scripts.deps: "$npm_execpath" i && dotnet tool restore && dotnet femto src/Mingine.Engine
scripts.prepublishOnly: "$npm_execpath" run clean && "$npm_execpath" run deps && "$npm_execpath" run build

author: Yellowsink
